01 - Client Portfolio
Section 07 - Portfolio Overview

Client Projects

Each client has its own dedicated workspace - Architecture overview, deployment Build Guide, and Agents & Estimates. Select a client below to open their project.

Client 01 - EMS
Evergreen Medical Supplies
Compounding Pharmacy - Pharmacy Operations
The reference RealTimeOS implementation. A single, closed, continuous pipeline processing every prescription order from email receipt to AusPost dispatch. Six layers, 13 agents, zero drift. Every pattern established here becomes the template for all future client projects.
01 - Architecture & Overview 02 - Build Guide (11 phases) 03 - Agents & Estimates 04 - Complete Reference

Client 03 - RLAW
RLAW
Future Client - Legal Sector
Legal sector RealTimeOS deployment. Compliance-specific fact types, Trust Account access controls, legal professional privilege handling, and Law Society compliance requirements. Legal practice data is predominantly RESTRICTED classification - special handling applies throughout.
